resources.string: Welcome to Team Zero Mobile App!
Not a user yet? Click below to register

Invalid username!
Please make sure it contains only:

1) Letters (lowercase and uppercase)
2) Numbers
3) Characters '-', '.' or '_'

Invalid password!
Please make sure:

1) Password contains at least 1 uppercase character
2) Password contains at least 1 lowercase character
3) Password contains at least 1 digit
4) Password contains at least 1 special character
5) Password is between 6 and 30 characters
Confirmed password is not identical!\nPlease try again!
Invalid email format!\nPlease type in your email again
Confirmed email is not identical!\nPlease type in your email again!
Please fill the information below correctly
Registration successful but login failed\n\nPlease try again!
Registration unsuccessful!\n\nPlease try again with other credentials!
Type in the box down below to search for a user to chat with\n\nTo display a full list of users from this chat app, just search without any text
Error fetching data from server. Please try again!
No contacts found on our database.\nPlease try again!
No contact found with the requested name.\nPlease try another name!
